core

Class RenderableComponents

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.RenderableComponents

  • public class RenderableComponents
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all the RenderableComponents.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  RenderableComponents.RenderableComponentList
      Represents a list which contains RenderableComponents using the same Renderable and GeometryRenderer.
      private class  RenderableComponents.RenderableMap
      The RenderableMap contains RenderableComponents grouped by Renderables.

      • removeRenderableComponentWhenChanged

        private void removeRenderableComponentWhenChanged(@NotNull
                                                  RenderableComponent<? extends Renderable> renderableComponent,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  Renderable fromRenderable,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  Material fromMaterial)
        Removes the given RenderableComponent from the hierarchy based on the given Renderable and Material. You should call this method if the RenderableComponent's Material or Renderable changed and it's not detached from a GameObject.
        Parameters:
        renderableComponent - RenderableComponent
        fromRenderable - Renderable
        fromMaterial - Material

private RenderableComponents.RenderableMap getOrAdd(@NotNull
